content.question: Lines 27-28 (“Their . . . to me”) emphasize the speaker’s sense that her

choices.label: current sadness and recent disappointment are temporary
career goals are at odds with her long-held beliefs
personal pride and strong ambition have sustained her
past life and true identity are always present

content.answer: past life and true identity are always present

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
